site_name: (Land At Former Nufarm Uk Ltd)Amazon Logistics Warehouse, Graviton Park, Crabtree Manorway NorthBelvedereKentDA17 6BQ
description: Application for a minor material amendment to the layout, configuration and use of the service yard and staff/visitor car park regarding conditions 2, 5, and 6 to parent permission ref. 15/01943/FULM (The parent permission being for the proposal under Section 73 of The Town and Country Planning Act 1990 regarding  the erection of three buildings for Light Industrial (Use Class B1(c)); storage and distribution (Use Class B8) and/or Industrial (Use Class B2) purposes; ancillary offices and associated car parking, landscape, servicing and access arrangements approved under reference 15/00121/FULM dated 17.4.15 in relation to raising the site levels and revising the drainage strategy).
